con:config.con:expectedResult: <appSettings> <add key="ServiceControlQueueName" value="Particular.ServiceControl.FSKYT-T"/> <add key="EnableHeartbeatPlugin" value="true"/> <add key="EnableSagaAuditPlugin" value="false"/> <add key="EnableNServiceBusInstallers" value="true"/> <add key="IVTR_DriftKontoNummer" value="6993000113"/> <add key="IVTR_URL" value="http://ivtr-kt.ia.tsnet.se/intweb/wcfservice.svc"/> <add key="Environment" value="T"/> <add key="AhKonto" value="svcYtAh-T"/> <add key="EpostadressFelmeddelande" value="peter.tang@transportstyrelsen.se"/> <add key="EnableKvittensfilTask" value="true"/> <add key="KvittensfilFilepath" value="\\ts-netapp2\Sysfiler-T\Yrkestrafik\FSK\Postombudkvittens\T"/> <add key="KvittensfilTaskIntervalInSeconds" value="900"/> <add key="EnableBetalfilTask" value="false"/> <add key="BetalfilDirectory" value="\\ts-netapp2\Sysfiler-t\yrkestrafik\FSK\ATKF"/> <add key="BetalfilTaskIntervalInSeconds" value="3600"/> <add key="SkipBetalningForAnsokan" value="true"/> </appSettings>

con:testStep.name: Manual Delete SQL 7 tabeller
con:testStep.con:description:
begin transaction
declare @personId int = 10445994
delete FROM [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Korthandelse] where id in ( select KH.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Korthandelse] KH join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Kort] K on (KH.KortId=K.Id) join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A on (A.Id = K.AnsokanId) where A.PersonId=@personId )
delete from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[KortIntressent] where id in ( select KI.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[KortIntressent] KI join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Kort] K on (KI.Id=K.Id) join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A on (A.Id = K.AnsokanId) where A.PersonId=@personId )
delete from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Kort] where id in ( select K.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Kort] K join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A on (A.Id = K.AnsokanId) where A.PersonId=@personId )
delete FROM [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Beslut] where id in ( select B.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Beslut] B join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A on (A.Id = B.Id) where A.PersonId=@personId )
delete FROM [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[GenomfordKontroll] where id in ( select GK.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[GenomfordKontroll] GK join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A on (A.Id = GK.AnsokanId) where A.PersonId=@personId )
delete FROM [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokanhandelse] where id in ( select AH.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokanhandelse] AH join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A on (A.Id = AH.AnsokanId) where A.PersonId=@personId )
delete FROM [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] where id in ( select A.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A where A.PersonId=@personId )
rollback

con:config.con:query:
begin transaction
declare @personId int = :PID_1
delete FROM [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Korthandelse] where id in ( select KH.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Korthandelse] KH join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Kort] K on (KH.KortId=K.Id) join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A on (A.Id = K.AnsokanId) where A.PersonId=@personId )
delete from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[KortIntressent] where id in ( select KI.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[KortIntressent] KI join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Kort] K on (KI.Id=K.Id) join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A on (A.Id = K.AnsokanId) where A.PersonId=@personId )
delete from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Kort] where id in ( select K.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Kort] K join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A on (A.Id = K.AnsokanId) where A.PersonId=@personId )
delete FROM [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Beslut] where id in ( select B.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Beslut] B join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A on (A.Id = B.Id) where A.PersonId=@personId )
delete FROM [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[GenomfordKontroll] where id in ( select GK.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[GenomfordKontroll] GK join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A on (A.Id = GK.AnsokanId) where A.PersonId=@personId )
delete FROM [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokanhandelse] where id in ( select AH.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokanhandelse] AH join [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A on (A.Id = AH.AnsokanId) where A.PersonId=@personId )
delete FROM [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] where id in ( select A.id from [AnsFskYt-t].[dbo].[Ansokan] A where A.PersonId=@personId )
commit
